Posts.Content: Oct 1, 2008 04:21PM jacqueb wrote: Hi Ladies.  I am new to the list and have been looking for women to talk to who are going through a similar thing.  I was  DX in 1999 with St. I Node Neg. Invasive triple Neg.  Lumpectomy, 4 cycles of AC and 30 Rad. TX I thought I was cruising until I found a lump, same breast.  March 1, 2008.  Pet scan showed a 2.9 cm lung lesion.  I had a lobectomy and mastectomy the same day followed by 12 Avastin/Taxol.  I am off TX now and am just plain old scared.  Good luck everyone and I look forward to sharing. Jacque
Posts.Title: Treatment options for Lung Mets, please. Traci-----TripNeg Traci-----TripNeg

Posts.Content: Oct 2, 2008 05:23PM jacqueb wrote: Wow Kim.  I very much understand your desire to protect your daughter from this awful disease.  I have not been tested yet for the gene and I have two daughters, 21 and 23.  Hugs, Jacque
